dc:title: On Pilgrimage - December 1954
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Diary-like account of talks and visits to friends in Massachusetts, Minnesota, Chicago, and Milwaukee. Relishes reporting on the apostolates of lay and clergy alike. Notes her attraction to the Abbey of St. Procopius.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 679 1954-12-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
